description: Array T read by rows: T(i,j)=R(i-j,j), where R(i,0)=1 for i >= 0, R(0,j)=0 for j >= 1, R(i,j)=Sum{R(h,k): 0<=h<=i-1, 0<=k<=j} for i >= 1, j >= 1.
comments: Formatted as a triangular array, it is [1, 0, 1, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, ...] DELTA [0, 1, 0, -1, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, ...] where DELTA is the operator defined in A084938 . - _Philippe Del√©ham_, Nov 05 2006
author: _Clark Kimberling_, May 28 2000
